page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: HOUSING IN SOMERSHAM AND COLNE, THE TWO RESIDENTIAL AREAS IN THIS SURVEY BLOCK, IS VARIED. BOTH CONTAIN AN OLD VILLAGE CENTRE OF LARGELY (18TH AGE, A FEW BEING LISTED BUILDINGS. THE VILLAGES HAVE BOTH EXPANDED WITH MODERN VARIED ESTATES. THESE ESTATES CONTAIN DIFFERENT SIZES OF HOUSING FROM STUDIO FLATS TO FOUR BEDROOM DETACHED HOUSING. AN ATTEMPT HAS BEEN MADE WITH EACH ESTATE TO PROVIDE A VARIETY OF HOUSE DESIGN AND SIZE, WHICH IS PLEASING TO THE EYE AND AVOIDS THE 'LITTLE BOXES' APPEARANCE OF MANY LARGE URBAN ESTATES. MANY OF THE HOUSES CATER FOR FIRST_TIME BUYERS WITH YOUNG CHILDREN, BUT A NEW ESTATE IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION IN SOMERSHAM WITH MORE EXECUTIVE_TYPE HOUSING. THERE ARE ALSO A GOOD NUMBER OF MODERN NON-ESTATE HOUSES IN BOTH AREAS AND SOME ISOLATED FARMHOUSES.
